template.template_analysis: The faangpath_simple template is structured for a clean and professional CV format suitable for technical roles. It provides a clear layout for showcasing skills and experiences effectively.
template.customization_options: Key customization options include modifying the color scheme, adjusting section titles, and adding additional sections for projects or certifications.

detected_fields.ai_field_analysis: Utilize the 'name' command to replace 'Your name' placeholder with the candidate's actual name. Ensure correct formatting for the 'address' command to display the candidate's contact information properly.

candidate_data.name: Maciej Kasik
candidate_data.profile_summary: Motivated Computer Science graduate with a strong foundation in programming and problem-solving. Seeking a Cloud Data Engineer role to leverage hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design. Excited to contribute to system performance optimization, data security, and collaborative cross-functional projects.

Education requirements.field: Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field

Key responsibilities: Designing, developing, and maintaining secure and scalable data pipelines using medallion architecture
Migrating SQL Server to Snowflake on AWS Cloud
Implementing medallion architecture (bronze, silver, and gold layers)
Company values/culture mentions: Building a better world through financial inclusion
Certifications or qualifications: Certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms
Exact phrases that should appear in the: Hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design
Proven success in migrating SQL Server to the cloud, ensuring data integrity and performance
Skilled in bronze, silver, and gold layers, ensuring data reliability, scalability, and accessibility
Experience in query optimization, data modeling, and system performance tuning
Knowledge of encryption, access control, and regulatory compliance for cloud-based systems
Ability to translate technical concepts into business insights, working effectively with architects, analysts, and leadership
Anticipates challenges, removes obstacles, and creates scalable long-term solutions

strengths: Strong match in required technical skills like SQL, Data engineering, AWS, Snowflake, Security, and Performance tuning
Advanced level skills in Soft Skills like Strong communication, Collaboration, Problem-solving, and Innovation
Relevant educational background with a Master's in Computer Science and ongoing Bachelor's in Systems Engineering
weaknesses: Lack of direct mention of AI in skills
No certifications mentioned which are preferred in the job requirements
improvement_suggestions: Consider adding AI as a skill to align with job requirements
Include any relevant certifications in Snowflake, AWS, or other cloud platforms to enhance the profile

job_analysis.template_specific_recommendations: To highlight key qualifications, ensure the CV clearly showcases hands-on experience with Snowflake, SQL, AWS, ETL, and data pipeline design. Emphasize success in migrating SQL Server to the cloud, query optimization, and system performance tuning. Highlight strong communication, collaboration, problem-solving, and innovation skills to align with the job's soft skill requirements.
